title: Journey Across the Overgrown Earth: A Post-Apocalypse
description: A hundred years after plants overtook the Earth, mankind is confined to small strongholds scattered across the world. In a last-ditch effort to save their home, the leader of one such city sends out four people to try and recover a lost piece of A Stone of Energy known as Uranium. Join the group of explorers as they brave the predators and obstacles of the alien-like landscape, analyze the relics of the old world, and do their best to survive the inhospitable environment.
author: Kyle Hellkamp
